page.title: 08SOCIAL LIFE IN RURAL AREAS
page.content: Because of the very isolated nature of the area the social life plays a very important part in uniting the villagers. Whilst fund-raising is the aim of most events they are never-the- less well supported. Both villages have their share of socials, jumble sales, auctions, wine and cheese parties and whist drives. { Harvest Suppers}are an annual event. Country dancing, Garden Parties and Barbecues are all popular summer occasions. At the Stocking's Field in Aston Ingham the{Scouts}hold an annual{"It's {a Knockout"}and there is a combined {Church Fete and President's XI Cricket {Match.}This has replaced the old August IIth celebrations commemerating the rebuilding of the Church and held at the Rectory.
